GSD.description:
drbd: fix potential silent data corruption

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.110 by commit fde8c5cad0881fb899a104a187c80fb8cfc8af97. For more details please see the references link.
